Articles.Content:
can anyone beat my altitude of 148098823181 meters? (actually mine was infinite lol but i wasnt patient enough to wait any longer)

NO ADDONS ALLOWED!!!!!!

stock parts only

to send in a request... you have two options

-option 1 record a youtube video of you building and flying your entire ship and send me the link

-option 2 give me the download link for the ship...(remember im not that patient i will give each ship only 90 minutes (including mine) to gain its maximum altitude) I will pilot it the way you want (eg. when to eject the stages throttle power etc.)

Escape velocity from Kerbin is pretty easy.

In 0.11, the farthest I let thing run was ~800GM on an 11m/s escape course. Kerbol is invisible at that distance.

Haven\'t tried a Kerbol escape now that it\'s an actual gravitational body.

Escape velocity from Kerbin is pretty easy.

In 0.11, the farthest I let thing run was ~800GM on an 11m/s escape course. Kerbol is invisible at that distance.

Haven\'t tried a Kerbol escape now that it\'s an actual gravitational body.

i believe you but can i have a download link?

i like observing ships lol
Sorry, ship is now deprecated (read: lost) due to KSP updates.

Sorry, ship is now deprecated (read: lost) due to KSP updates.

oh ok
Well, since I managed to reach escape velocity once, my max altitude is infinite... Well, limited by the end of the universe, possibly.
